name: Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Prior to starting works, ensure that the construction drawings are both IFC and the Current Version.
Frequency - Prior to work planning and start
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - ITP to be submitted to the Engineer and approved prior to works beginning
Frequency - Submit 10 days prior to commencement of works
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Methodology and associated documents to be prepared, reviewed and approved internally prior to work commencement.
Verifying Document - Construction Pack Sign Off
Frequency - Prior to Construction & after any major incident
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Ensure traffic signal pole, access chamber, and controller cabinet locations are set out per IFC drawings/data.
Frequency - Prior to Construction & Every Revision of IFC Drgs / Data
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - HCC Traffic Engineer, BBO Designer and MSQA rep to walk over and confirm pole locations.
○ Brandon Harley - Senior Traffic Signal Specialist - HCC City Transport
○ Holly Blackley - Senior Transport Network Operator HCC City Transport
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - BBO/HCC written confirmation of any changes made to pole positions.
Frequency - Post walkover, and prior to installation

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Install Erosion Sediment Control measures in line with PWRBSS ESCP plans. Inspect, monitor, and maintain ESCP measures weekly and immediately before & after significant weather events.
Frequency - Prior to Construction. Inspect, Monitor, and Maintain Weekly and immediately before and after significant weather events.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Inform stakeholders of upcoming works. Agree plans for maintaining access to properties during construction with landowners.
Standard / Specification - Project Stakeholder Management Plan
Frequency - Prior to Construction with continue updates throughout the works
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Ground Disturbance Permit must be in place before any ground breaking activity commences, incl. trenching, driving waratahs or survey pegs, and topsoil strip.

○ Permit to Dig will be based on BBO existing Services Drawings, Before U Dig Plans , potholing by the project, CAT & Genny survey, and visual inspections. Doner Permit encompasses external provider permit requirements.
○ All known services must be clearly marked on site and briefed to the workforce .
Verifying Document - Ground Disturbance Permit, DN-ZH-FM043.1
Frequency - Prior to Construction. Reviewed and Reissued weekly or when site conditions change.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - PS1 certificate required for all pole types.
Standard / Specification - Project Specification Apendix E 3.16

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Unless otherwise specified, VC6 ELV controller (compatible with latest SCATS software) fitted with a generator socket matching existing HCC controller cabinet colours.
○ Must be fitted with a sticker indicating the Site ID Number.
Standard / Specification - Project Specification Apendix E 2.3.5/2.3.6/3.6
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - HCC to provide Site ID number.
Standard / Specification - Project Specification Apendix E 3.6
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - HCC must approve of traffic monitoring camera which should meet requirements. Hardware is required to have a minimum 12 months warranty period.
○ HCC preference is an Axis Q6075-E along with an Axis Q6010-E, using the Axis T91L61 pole mounts.
Standard / Specification - Project Specification Appendix E 3.19.1
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Engage HCC to engage Lightwire. Project team to coordinate with for on-site installation.
Standard / Specification - Project Specification Apendix E 3.18
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Apply for new commercial electrical connection via the WEL Networks website/login for each new signalised intersection (NC1 Form).
○ Traffic signals subontractor to confirm electrical requirements.
Standard / Specification - Project Specification Appendix E 3.3
Verifying Document - Approval document/NC1 Form with ICP number
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - HCC to provide to contractor (Downer or TSL).
Brandon Harley - Senior Traffic Signal Specialist - HCC City Transport
Standard / Specification - Project Specification Appendix E 3.15.3
Frequency - Requested at least 6 weeks prior to bench testing date.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Traffic signals contractor to bench test files.
Frequency - Once per intersection, at least 1 week prior to comissioning
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Report results. Check this meets poles deisgn (i.e. >= 50kPa).
Frequency - One pole per intersection corner (i.e. north-west, north-east etc)
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Photographic evidence of each pole base to be submitted as part of PS3
Standard / Specification - Project Specification Appendix E 3.16
Frequency - Each pole base prior to foundation pour.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Ensure poles are fitted with/displaying the correct number and match the CIS sheets (pole numbers match program and diagram numbers).
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Controller cabinet fitted with Site ID Number sticker.
Standard / Specification - Project Specification Apendix E 3.6
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Access chambers installed in the berm surrounded by 300mm wide concrete apron to 100mm deep. 25MPa 28-day compressive strength concrete.
Frequency - Each access chamber in the berm
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - KSJB to have 150mm wide concrete surround to a depth of 150mm.
Frequency - Each KSJB in the berm

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Controller cabinet to be surrounded by 300mm wide concrete apron around the base of the controller, widened to 900mm on the side adjacent to the door. 100mm thick, with slight fall away from conroller.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Rubberised bitument adhesive sealant applied to all saw cuts in the roadway
Standard / Specification - Project Specification Appendix E 3.11
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Saw cuts made through kerb and channel to be sealed with epoxy resin motar.
Standard / Specification - Project Specification Appendix E 4.7
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Completed and signed certificate of electrical compliance.
Frequency - 1 per intersection prior to commissioning.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Signals contractor to notify City Transportation Unit (CTU) Operations Room at least 1 week before SCATS commnications will be available from the controller.
Standard / Specification - Project Specification Appendix E 3.15.4
Frequency - 1 week prior to SCATS communication being available from controller
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - SCATS comminication achieved for a minimum of 48hours prior to comissioning.
Standard / Specification - Project Specification Appendix E 3.15.4
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Cable termination chart, CIS and logbook placed in document pocket inside controller cabinet.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - RCA traffic signals representative (City Transportation) approval to switch on.
Standard / Specification - Project Specification Appendix E 3.15.4
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Site Acceptance Test Chart to be filled out and signed.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - PS1 Design Producer Statement from Chartered Professional Engineer
Standard / Specification - Project Specification Appendix E 3.16
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - PS3 Certificate to be accompanied by photographic evidence of each pole (see requirement above).
Standard / Specification - Project Specification Appendix E 3.16
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Approval from Hamilton City Council and the signals maintenance contractor.
Standard / Specification - Project Specification Appendix E 2.2.2
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Asbuilts reviewed and submitted showing final location of all poles, access chambers, KSJB, loops and cabinets.
Verifying Document - Survey Data, As Built Drawings, Photographs, Red Pen As-Builts including Undercuts
